text: The truth is, I've never fooled anyone. I've let men sometimes fool themselves.
author: Marilyn Monroe

text: The fact is that I find more most men are more open, more generous, and much more stimulating than the majority of females I know.
author: Marilyn Monroe

text: Men who think that a woman's past love affairs lessen her love for them are usually stupid and weak.
author: Marilyn Monroe

text: If you spend your life competing with business men, what do you have? A bank account and ulcers!
author: Marilyn Monroe

text: When it comes to gossip, I have to readily admit men are as guilty as women.
author: Marilyn Monroe
